'''Patrat''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ミネズミ''' ''Minezumi'') is a {{type|Normal}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s into {{p|Watchog}} starting at [[level]] 20.

==Biology==
Patrat is a rodent-like Pokémon that resembles a {{wp|chipmunk}}. It is mostly brown with a tan stomach and face. It has a large pointed tooth that sticks out of its mouth. Patrat has a flat face, and its cheeks are very round. Patrat has cheek pouches that it uses to store food. Its ears are small and pointed. Its head has a black band that covers the eyes, which have red irises with a yellow ring and black pupils. Its feet are small and black with three toes. Its long tail has scruffy white tip, and is usually standing up straight. This tail is used for communication; its tail is raised when it sees an enemy. Patrat is very conscious and wary regarding its surroundings and is always on guard. [[BW018|The anime]] shows Patrat living in tunnels.

==In the anime==
===In the main series===
[[File:Sean father Patrat.png|thumb|250px|left|Patrat in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
====Major appearances====
Multiple Patrat debuted in ''[[BW001|In The Shadow of Zekrom!]]''. They also appeared in ''[[BW002|Enter Iris and Axew!]]''.

Three male Patrat were seen in the beginning of ''[[BW024|Emolga the Irresistible!]]'' gathering apples. Their harvest was stolen by a {{TP|Iris|gluttonous Emolga|Emolga}} who tricked them with {{m|Attract}}.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[XY035|The Forest Champion!]]'', where it, along with a {{p|Sentret}} and {{p|Pachirisu}}, was gathering food, only to be scared by an {{p|Ursaring}}. However, they were saved thanks to the forest champion {{AP|Hawlucha}}.

A Patrat appeared in a flashback in ''[[XY088|A Trip Down Memory Train!]]'', where it was among the group of Pokémon that befriended [[Clemont's Bunnelby]] when it was still a wild Pokémon.

====Minor appearances====
Multiple Patrat appeared in ''[[BW003|A Sandile Gusher of Change!]]'' alongside multiple {{p|Pidove}} and {{p|Deerling}} when they needed help from {{Ash}} and {{ashfr}}.

A Patrat appeared on a computer screen in ''[[BW004|The Battle Club and Tepig's Choice!]]''.

A pair of Patrat made a brief appearance in ''[[BW018|Sewaddle and Burgh in Pinwheel Forest!]]'', where [[Burgh]] was able to heal a sick one.

{{OBP|Omega|BW039}} has a Patrat, which he used in ''[[BW039|Reunion Battles In Nimbasa!]]'' for the [[Club Battle]], but they lost.

Patrat made cameo appearances in ''[[BW005|Triple Leaders, Team Threats!]]'', ''[[BW006|Dreams by the Yard Full!]]'', ''[[BW010|A Rival Battle for Club Champ!]]'', ''[[BW019|A Connoisseur's Revenge!]]'', ''[[BW023|Battling for the Love of Bug-Types!]]'', ''[[BW057|The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!]]'', ''[[BW059|Stopping the Rage of Legends! Part 1]]'', ''[[BW069|Climbing the Tower of Success!]]'', ''[[BW071|Search for the Clubultimate!]]'', ''[[BW080|Clash of the Connoisseurs!]]'', ''[[BW085|All for the Love of Meloetta!]]'', ''[[BW092|Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!]]'', and ''[[BW104|Mission: Defeat Your Rival!]]''.

Multiple Patrat appeared in ''[[BW051|Lost at the Stamp Rally!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW065|Battling the Bully!]]'', under the ownership of [[Sean]]'s father.

Multiple Patrat appeared in ''[[M15|Kyurem VS. The Sword of Justice]]'', during the {{OBP|Swords of Justice|M15}} legend.

A Patrat briefly appeared in the {{OBP|elder|Village of Dragons}}'s flashback in ''[[BW100|A Village Homecoming!]]'' and also in one of Iris's flashbacks in ''[[BW101|Drayden Versus Iris: Past, Present, and Future!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW112|Team Plasma's Pokémon Power Plot!]]''.

Multiple Patrat appeared in ''[[BW118|Secrets From Out of the Fog!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW114|Saving Braviary]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW119|Meowth, Colress and Team Rivalry!]]''.

A {{pkmn|Trainer}}'s Patrat appeared in ''[[BW125|Cilan and the Case of the Purrloin Witness!]]''.

Multiple Patrat appeared in a flashback in ''[[BW127|The Island of Illusions!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW132|Searching for a Wish!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in a fantasy or a flashback in ''[[BW134|The Journalist from Another Region!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[BW137|Celebrating the Hero's Comet!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[XY008|Grooming Furfrou!]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[PK27|Pikachu and the Pokémon Music Squad]]''.

A Trainer's Patrat appeared in ''[[XY111|Unlocking Some Respect!]]''.

Three Patrat appeared in ''[[XY119|A Full-Strength Battle Surprise!]]''. These Patrat were among a group of Pokémon escaping a forest where [[Team Flare]] were conducting an experiment.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[M19|Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel]]'' as one of the Pokémon seen at [[Nebel Plateau]].

A Patrat appeared in ''[[XY137|Battling With a Clean Slate!]]'', under the ownership of an unnamed Trainer.

Two Trainers each owned a Patrat, which appeared in ''[[XY138|The First Day of the Rest of Your Life!]]''.

===In the Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 Animated Trailer===
A Patrat appeared in the [[Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2 Animated Trailer]], under the ownership of a resident of [[Aspertia City]].

==In the manga==
[[File:Lenora Patrat Adventures.png|thumb|200px|Patrat in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Be the Best! Pokémon B+W manga===
In the [[Be the Best! Pokémon B+W]] manga, [[Monta]] captures a Patrat in ''[[PBW1|Advance Toward the Path of the Strongest!]]''.

===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
The [[BW Agency]] have three Patrat hired to appear in different medias such as advertising and movies, one of them is named Alain. They first appeared in ''[[PS465|Lights, Camera...Action]]'', where they did an [[Xtransceiver]] commercial with a girl.

Patrat appeared in a fantasy in ''[[PS466|An Odd Speech]]'' and ''[[PS507|A Misunderstanding]]''.

[[Lenora]] has a Patrat which she used it against {{adv|Black}} in ''[[PS472|Wheeling and Dealing]]''.

A Patrat appeared in ''[[PS483|Special Delivery]]'' as one of the Pokémon competing in {{ci|Nimbasa}}'s [[Pokémon Musical]].

[[Shoko]]'s four Patrat first appear in ''[[PS506|Old Wounds]]'', and later are seen rescuing the [[Gym Leader]]s captured by [[Team Plasma]].

===In the Pokémon Pocket Monsters manga===
A Patrat makes an appearance in {{OBP|Pocket Monsters BW|Kosaku Anakubo}}.

==Trivia==
* Patrat shares its {{pkmn|category}} with {{p|Sentret}}. They are both known as the Scout Pokémon.
* Patrat is the only Pokémon with a [[base stats|base stat]] total of 255.
** It also has the lowest base stat total of all Pokémon introduced in [[Generation V]].

===Origin===
It appears to be based on a {{wp|prairie dog}}, {{wp|chipmunk}} or {{wp|meerkat}}.

====Name origin====
Patrat is a combination of ''patrol'' and ''rat''. It may also be a play on ''{{wp|packrat}}''.

Minezumi is a combination of 見 ''mi'' (looking) and 鼠 ''nezumi'' (mouse).
